metadata.title: CVE-2023-43785 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in libX11 due to a boundary condition within the_XkbReadKeySyms() function. This flaw allows a local user to trigger anout-of-bounds read error and read the contents of memory on the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-43785` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx11-6 - 2:1.6.4-3ubuntu0.4+esm2
libx11-data - 2:1.6.4-3ubuntu0.4+esm2
libx11-xcb1 - 2:1.6.4-3ubuntu0.4+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libx11 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.6.4-3ubuntu0.4+esm2').
